name: Purple Little Zipper pouch coin purse Gadget Case ECO Friendly Fancy Purple Orchid (Padded)
description:
Sophisticated Fancy Purple Orchid designer fabric. This pouch would make a super addition to any handbag!

Eco-Friendly "go green" item--the quilt batting I used in this lovely little zip pouch is made from 100% recycled plastic bottles, Oh so soft!

I have bat quilt interfaced this fabric for extra strength yet still soft and comfortable to use. The zipper close provides extra security. This little zip pouch has so many wonderful uses. Great as a coin purse, small cosmetic case, or even your ipod or other small gadgets. Like all of my pouches, padded for extra protection. Fabric pattern may vary.

Approx Size:4 1/2" x 3 1/2"

All my items are made in my smoke free home.
Spot clean only.

name: Padded Large Zipper Pouch Cosmetic Pouch Gadget Case Cosmetic Bag NEW Flora Paisley Leaf
description:
Lovely Flora Paisley Leaf designer fabric makes this wonderful addition to any handbag! If you like Green then you are going to love this- one of my NEW Favorites :)

A new style coin purse/zipper pouch that has a flat bottom so it can stand on its own. Made with these beautiful designer fabric that I bat quilt interfacing for extra strength yet still soft and comfortable to use with zipper close for extra security. This large zipper pouch has so many wonderful uses. Great as a coin purse, cosmetic case, or even your ipod or digital camera case. Like all of my pouches, padded for extra protection! 

Approx Size:8" long x 5" tall x 2" wide deep

Fabric pattern may vary.
All my items are made in my smoke free home.
Spot clean only.
